name: Possibly Pong!
description:
This is a simple, multiplayer, pong-clone, made with LÖVE. It uses sounds and graphics I created myself. :-)

Other than that, it's just a simple, but nostalgic, and fun little game.

To run, you will need to install LÖVE. https://love2d.org

https://github.com/jessehorne/possiblypong

Keys

Player1 - Left, Right

Player2 - A, D

Once a player wins, press 'return'
